title: Bloomberg Markets: Ciocca on Self-Indulgent Consumer Staples
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Ciocca on Self-Indulgent Consumer Staples
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Douglas G Ciocca CEO/Partner Kavar Capital Partners LLC Discussing the markets and why he likes self-indulgent consumer staples (alcohol, tobacco, salty snack, fast food and marijuana) while considering the changing buying patterns of the consumer.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
